00007 enum VariableType
00008 {
00009   VAR_BOOL,
00010   VAR_NOTBOOL,
00011   VAR_BOUND,
00012   VAR_SPARSEBOUND,
00013   VAR_DISCRETE,
00014   VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE,
00015   VAR_CONSTANT,
00016   VAR_MATRIX,
00017   VAR_INVALID
00018 };

00020 namespace ProbSpec
00021 {
00022 struct CSPInstance;
00023 
00024 class Var
00025 {
00026   VariableType type_m;
00027   int pos_m;
00028 public:
00029   int pos() const { return pos_m; }
00030   VariableType type() const { return type_m; }
00031   void setType(VariableType v) { type_m = v; }
00032   
00033   Var(VariableType _type, int _pos) : type_m(_type), pos_m(_pos)
00034   { }
00035   
00036   Var(const Var& v) : type_m(v.type_m), pos_m(v.pos_m)
00037   {}
00038   
00039   Var() : type_m(VAR_INVALID), pos_m(-1)
00040   {}
00041   
00042   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const Var& v)
00043   { return o << "Var. Type:" << v.type_m << " Pos:" << v.pos_m << "."; }
00044    
00045    bool operator==(const Var& var) const
00046    { return type_m == var.type_m && pos_m == var.pos_m; }
00047    
00048    bool operator<(const Var& var) const
00049    { return (type_m < var.type_m) || (type_m == var.type_m && pos_m < var.pos_m); }
00050 };
00051 
00052 }
